contest-event.event-date:
Oct. 10, 1987 D North East Derbyshire District Council Annual Brass Band Festival (Grade Four)
North East Derbyshire District Council Annual Brass Band Festival (Grade Four) 440 Own Choice Test Piece Contest North East Derbyshire District Council Annual Brass Band Festival dronfield-contest-fourth-section
Sports Centre, Dronfield, Derbyshire 29th annual contest. Prizes - 1st £90 and trophy, 2nd £50, 3rd £40. 7 bands competed.
Oct. 22, 2014, 10:13 a.m. March 29, 2017, 2:08 p.m.
1 Riddings Band Geoff Gossage
2 Staveley Works Band Alan Needham
3 Rolls Royce (Derby) Band Mark Rowland
4 Ashover Brass Band J. Slater
Unknown Result Whitwell Brass Band J. D. Wheatley
Unknown Result Darley Dale Band K. Fryer
Unknown Result Clipstone Colliery Welfare J. Roberts
Withdrawn Bakewell Silver Band Unknown
Withdrawn Ilkeston Borough Peter Moon
Withdrawn Oughtibridge Band A. W. McLauchlan
Withdrawn Whiston Lonsdale Brass Tom Miller
